::Shadow Wing::

She heard him and tried to get the protoform to talk in reply.  But 
only a few garbled sounds came out.  She couldn't feel his hand or 
the needle.  But she could tell that he was standing next to her.  
She tried to make the form talk again. "Heeehhhh..." she stopped and 
tried to fix the connection and make it stronger.  "Heeellll.."  She 
kept tring, but couldn't make it work right. 




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Veratis walked over to the protoform and touched it's arm. "Can 
youy 
> feal my hand? he asked wondering just what extent the protoform had 
> developed. "Can you feal pain, cold, hot?" he didn't really expect 
a 
> response from her he was asking the questions more to himself than 
> anything. He picked out a needle "This may hurt a little." he told 
> her as he jabbed the needle into the Protoforms arm extracting a 
> sample of the protoplasm from the body.
